HeroSection.Name: Ivaylo Ivanov
HeroSection.Text: I bring creative ideas to life with code. I specialize in JavaScript, and modern frameworks to create seamless and engaging web experiences. Let's build something extraordinary together!

SkillsSection.Body: Results-oriented JavaScript developer with a passion for crafting innovative web solutions, leveraging modern frameworks and tools.
